name: Alex Kidd 3DX
description:
Play the first level of "Alex Kidd in miracle world" in a 3D world.

You can choose between retro and photorealistic graphics.

The game has a extra mode "Ghost mode" where you have to runaway from a ghost.

This game is not affilied with Sega, it's just a fan game made by Miquel Camps Orteza @comandogdev.

CONTROLS

You can play with a keyboard+mouse or gamepad (playstation/xbox).

CREDITS

Music Above clouds - Girlz Melon

Music Underwater - The Way I Play

Music Intro - Takenobu Mitsuyoshi
